xt:extension.xt:author: Alex Jitianu
xt:extension.xt:name: XSpec Helper view

div.p: This plugin also requires the XSpec Framework. Please install them both.
What's New: The posibility to rerun just the failed scenarios.

A proof of concept plugin that contributes a view that presents the results of an XSpec transformation. After instalation, to use it, open an XSpec file and invoke the XSpec Run action from the toolbar.

xt:extension.xt:author: Alex Jitianu
xt:extension.xt:name: XSpec Framework (required by the XSpec Helper view plugin)

div.p: This framework is required by the XSpec Helper view plugin. Please install them both.
A customized version of the oXygen's built-in XSpec framework. It contributes a transformation scenario named "XSpec Report" that generates an HTML report that will be loaded by the XSpec Helper view
